title: Rare icons available for a limited time

replies.body: The duck and frog are in the wrong spots....
what?
Duck and frog are in the wrong spot
what do you mean
THE DUCK AND FROG ARE IN THE WRONG SPOT
am i being trolled?

> Thanks, Rift Duck (the one on his back) and Rift Frog (the one looking at us)!

Guys, they did it on purpose.

"Look at this great duck! Quack quack!" 

Then it shows a picture of a frog?
ok you got me good +1
In the post, it seems like the order of the icons are wrong. It seems like it should be the duck first, as that is what you mention first.
they are literally in the wrong spots according to the descriptions.
The icons are switched in the description. The frog is first, not the duck. ^^
what are you talking about??
right?
Pbe memes too strong.
After 5 months of careful analyzing, I've come to the conclusion that they are indeed in the right spot. Well played Rito.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
look at all these ppl being nice n tryin to help out. n who says the rift is only for all the toxics {{champion:48}} and trolls {{champion:27}}
Regardless that, there should be a discounted bundle if someone wants to buy them all, Come on !
seems like a meme
it's intentional
quack quack {{champion:223}}
Riot, did I ever tell you I love you?
Are the icons supposed to be available rn?
should be up now

Riot doesn't know their animals, that's a chicken not a duck! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
thanks for the catch!

I just wanted to say thank you. I know as someone who has been on the boards, i know a lot of people have been asking for these Icons. I personally have been wanting the Duck and Sakura Poro. Again thanks I'm sure a lot of us appreciate it to finally have it come out in NA servers!
no. thank YOU
My life as a member of the dukk club has been leading up to this moment

I have a much rarer frog.
http://new3.fjcdn.com/pictures/Rare+pepe+don+t+steal+the+rarest+pepe_d03ee3_5524015.jpg
It's a shiny!
That's a frog???
It's the rarest frog.

> [{quoted}](name=Myrmiron,realm=EUW,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=OjApw1N7,comment-id=002300000000,timestamp=2017-05-19T06:25:32.378+0000)
>
> It's the rarest frog.

Looks more like a duck to me.
Rift Duck and Rift Frog brought to you by NA Production.
You have been memed my friend
I don't get the joke.
From what I heard, the PBE swapped the two icons (frog and duck) back in 2015*, to where the Frog icon had the name "Rift Duck" and vice versa: http://imgur.com/BMqivRA.

To those saying "The duck and the frog are in the wrong spots" must've not read the ending of this post, which says "Thanks, Rift Duck (the one on his back) and Rift Frog (the one looking at us)!" As you can see in the icons, the frog (rift duck) is on his back, and the duck (rift frog) is looking at "us" in the icon.
Can you get these from hextech after they are offsale?
You can get any icon which isn't "limited" or "esports" from Hextech crafting. This means, no old ranked icons, no super old holiday icons, no beta icons, no team icons, etc.
Finally! I've been waiting for a froggy icon for years
Frogs for life baby! FROG!
I'd like a way to organize the summoner icons. So I can put all the lore locations together and the came-with-various-skins together.

No offense to Riot or anything, but do you think we could have more icons enabled for IP? I feel like theres not really anything available for IP aside from Champs/Runes at this point. Let us buy more icons for IP or just give more IP rewards please. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Any dates for when they come back or will I have to rely on RNGesus to give it to me? I was really busy for the past 2 months and I just got back on but it's right after the the sakura icons get taken off ;u;
Why did you remove this article? It's no longer showing in the news feed
teemo <3
